title: Fork, ca. 1680
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork with two-pointed tines. Handle enameled, oval medallion on each side of of the handle; one showing DIANA, the other MUCIUS SCAEVOLO (Patience and Constancy?) . Handle similarly shaped as handle of knife.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1680.
ca. 1680. silver, enamel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-63-c.
